name: KinesisFirehoseDeliveryStreamS3DestinationConfigurationEncryptionConfiguration
description: EncryptionConfiguration is a property of the Amazon Kinesis Firehose DeliveryStream S3DestinationConfiguration property that specifies the encryption settings that Amazon Kinesis Firehose (Firehose) uses when delivering data to Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3).

properties.name: KMSEncryptionConfig
properties.description: The AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) encryption key that Amazon S3 uses to encrypt your data.
properties.typeDescription: Amazon Kinesis Firehose DeliveryStream S3DestinationConfiguration EncryptionConfiguration KMSEncryptionConfig

properties.name: NoEncryptionConfig
properties.description: Disables encryption. For valid values, see the NoEncryptionConfig content for the EncryptionConfiguration data type in the Amazon Kinesis Firehose API Reference.
